item.title: How gold, bitcoin are moving beyond market hedge and boosting investment income
item.description: Investors want exposure to alternative assets that don't move with stocks and bonds. They also want income. Wall Street and BlackRock have an answer.

item.title: How does the U.S. stock market typically react to a government shutdown?
item.description: The markets could be in for some action if the government shutdown next week, according to Bank of America.

item.title: Chinese stocks are on fire this year, drawing big interest from foreign and domestic investors
item.description: Chinese stocks, once deemed univestable by many, are luring both local and foreign investors impressed by recent returns.
